titleStmt.title: A discourse of the necessity of church-guides, for directing Christians in necessary faith with some annotations on Dr Stillingfleet's answer to N.O. / by R.H.
titleStmt.author: R. H., 1609-1678.

notesStmt.note: "R.H." was a pseudonym for Abraham Woodhead.
Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
